course_description: IDS 491 senior seminar serves as the capstone experience for all each class of interdisciplinary undergraduate scholars. Students write and present a portion of their senior project, read contemporary debates about interdisciplinarity, and design a shared unit of interdisciplinary study.
sections: Class Nbr: 4519, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Tulke, Status: Open
